author: Brohaha

text: Wtf. Each game is set up for a sequel. And sometimes, with certain stories and certain gameplay styles, it isn't easy to do that. The endings are hardly memorable, I honestly can't recall much myself. But it doesn't matter to me. I wouldn't judge it by that alone.
author: ShadowKinesis

text:
What do you need to know? That the series have pioneered modern platforming since its inception? That is has constantly stayed on the edge of the current technology? That as complex as it can become, it has always been fun and satisfying to master and complete each game? That as a game it is unique for being a third person shooter and a platform game? And most prominently here, that it has a distinguishable and delightful soundtrack? 

These things are true, for the games 1 through 3.
